title: LI 1 - Banks and Trust Companies
content:
LI 1 - Banks and Trust Companies

State Regulations
§ LI 1.1 - Acceptance of warrants to purchase stock of corporate borrowers
§ LI 1.2 - Offer of free personal checking account to persons who maintain minimum savings deposits
§ LI 1.3 - Trust company acting as agent of department of motor vehicles
§ LI 1.4 - Investments in the national corporation for housing partnerships and the national housing partnership
§ LI 1.5 - Lending limit treatment of portions of letters of credit subject to participation agreements
§ LI 1.6 - Trust company-imposition of service charges on unclaimed dividends
§ LI 1.7 - Charitable contributions by credit card
§ LI 1.8 - Writing covered call options on trust accounts
§ LI 1.9 - Use of cash as consideration for an acquisition effected under section 143-a of the banking law
§ LI 1.10 - Applicability of section 103(1)(a)'s loan limits to letters of credit issued to the commodity credit corporation

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
